column4: I swear I'm going to use windows if I hear that startup sound again (I'm warning you!!!) - how do I stop the sounds?! I have removed them from preferences/sound/system events, but they refuse to go away!!
this happens on all 3 of my ubuntu boxes
hmm, found a bug report on launchpad about it
It's an option under the Login screen setup, I think, if you're referring the godawfully annoying drums
